about_the_game:
The Formula XD Original Soundtrack is a collection of all 20 music tracks that appear in the game itself, plus 17 extra 'radio edit' versions. A fine addition to any indie game music library, and perfect for listening to while exercising or working. Enjoy the globetrotting Formula XD soundtrack wherever you go.

Music files are all presented as MPEG-4 AAC audio files, stored within a ZIP archive. Compatible with most modern music software. High quality 256+Kbps sound.


TRACK LISTING

1. Formula XD
2. Revving Up
3. Calling The Shots
4. Testing 1-2-3
5. Frog Hop
6. Sorry
7. Crikey
8. Mamma Mia
9. Sausages And Sauerkraut
10. Capitalism Is Kill
11. One Hump Or Two?
12. It Ain't 'Alf 'Ot
13. Jasmine Dragon
14. Danubeedoo
15. True Blues
16. Make Tea Not Love
17. We Have Reserves
18. Arriba!
19. Ola Sol!
20. The End Of Something
21. Testing 1-2-3 (looping)
22. Frog Hop (looping)
23. Sorry (looping)
24. Crikey (looping)
25. Mamma Mia (looping)
26. Sausages And Sauerkraut (looping)
27. Capitalism Is Kill (looping)
28. One Hump Or Two? (looping)
29. It Ain't 'Alf 'Ot (looping)
30. Jasmine Dragon (looping)
31. Danubeedoo (looping)
32. True Blues (looping)
33. Make Tea Not Love (looping)
34. We Have Reserves (looping)
35. Arriba! (looping)

37. The End Of Something (looping)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.4
  • Processor: PowerPC G4 or Intel Core Duo 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any 16-bit card or integrated audio
  • Additional Notes: MPEG-4 AAC audio

name: Formula XD Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: any
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any 16-bit card or integrated audio
  • Additional Notes: MPEG-4 AAC audio

short_description: Enjoy the globetrotting Formula XD soundtrack wherever you go.
